text: The 1992 Montreal Expos season was the 24th season in franchise history. They finished the season with a 87-75 record, good for second place in the National League East, 9 games behind the Pittsburgh Pirates. ==Offseason== * November 15, 1991: Gary Carter was selected off waivers by the Expos from the Los Angeles Dodgers.Gary Carter at Baseball Reference * November 18, 1991: Kenny Williams was released by the Expos.Kenny Williams at Baseball Reference * November 25, 1991: Andrés Galarraga was traded by the Expos to the St. Louis Cardinals for Ken Hill.Ken Hill at Baseball Reference * December 10, 1991: Sergio Valdez was signed as a free agent by the Expos.Sergio Valdez at Baseball Reference * January 10, 1992: Scott Service was signed as a free agent by the Expos.Scott Service at Baseball Reference * February 12, 1992: Rick Cerone was signed as a free agent by the Expos.Rick Cerone at Baseball Reference ==Spring training== The Expos held spring training at West Palm Beach Municipal Stadium in West Palm Beach, Florida – a facility they shared with the Atlanta Braves. It was their 16th season at the stadium; they had conducted spring training there from 1969 to 1972 and since 1981. ==Regular season== ===Season standings=== ===Record vs. opponents=== ===Opening Day starters=== *Iván Calderón *Gary Carter *Archi Cianfrocco *Delino DeShields *Mark Gardner *Marquis Grissom *Spike Owen *Larry Walker *Tim Wallach1992 Montreal Expos Roster by Baseball Almanac ===Notable transactions=== * May 8, 1992: Steve Lyons was signed as a free agent by the Expos.Steve Lyons at Baseball Reference * June 1, 1992: José Vidro was drafted by the Expos in the 6th round of the 1992 Major League Baseball draft. Player signed June 2, 1992.José Vidro at Baseball Reference * June 27, 1992: Steve Lyons was purchased from the Expos by the Boston Red Sox. * July 15, 1992: Jerry Willard was signed as a free agent by the Expos.Jerry Willard at Baseball Reference * July 16, 1992: Rick Cerone was released by the Expos. ===Roster=== {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
